Pre-Game Insights: Oklahoma City Thunder are on an eight-game win streak.
The Thunder have a strong home record with 15-2.
Oklahoma City is fourth in the Western Conference scoring 115.4 points per game.
The Knicks are 13-6 on the road.
New York is ninth in the NBA with 28.0 assists per game led by Jalen Brunson averaging 7.7.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander is averaging 31.2 points, 5.5 rebounds, 6.1 assists and two steals for the Thunder.
Karl-Anthony Towns is averaging 24.9 points, 13.7 rebounds and 3.3 assists for the Knicks.
The Thunder have won their last 10 games, averaging 114.6 points per game.
The Knicks have won 9 of their last 10 games, averaging 118.2 points per game.
